content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(37.0, -85.0)
A coal mining setup consisting of:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (37.0, -85.0), (39.0, -85.0), and (41.0, -86.0)
- Wooden chests at positions (36.5, -86.5), (39.5, -83.5), and (40.5, -87.5) collecting coal
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5, -86.5) and (35.5, -85.5) moving coal between entities

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Mining setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0) extracting copper and iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5) collecting the ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -58.0) for smelting
- Output chest at (-24.5, -58.5) collecting plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(-10.0, -59.0)
Large iron mining setup with:
- Three burner mining drills at (-10.0, -59.0), (-8.0, -59.0), and (-6.0, -59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -57.5) collecting ore
- Transport belt system connecting the components
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials

### Smelting Line at position(0.0, 0.0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- Four stone furnaces at (0.0, 0.0), (2.0, 0.0), (4.0, 0.0), and (6.0, 0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5, -2.5), (2.5, -2.5), (4.5, -2.5), (6.5, -2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between chests and furnaces

### Power Generation Complex at position(4.5, 20.5)
Power generation setup with:
- Steam engine at (4.5, 20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5, 22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Pipe network connecting water supply
- Electric poles creating power network (positions: 10.5,12.5; 7.5,20.5; 11.5,20.5; 7.5,13.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract items
- Must be within interaction range of the target entity before attempting to extract items
- Verify the target entity contains the items you're trying to extract

### Entity placement errors
- Check if the target position is already occupied before placing new entities
- Ensure proper spacing between entities according to their tile dimensions

### Fluid system errors
- Connect all fluid-carrying entities (pipes, boilers, pumps) properly before operation
- Ensure proper fluid flow direction in the pipe network

### Belt system warnings
- Clear blocked transport belts to maintain proper item flow
- Ensure inserters have proper clearance for pickup and drop-off positions

### Power system optimization
- Keep fuel supplied to burner entities to prevent work stoppage
- Maintain proper connections in the electrical network
